usefulItems: bowl, wire rack, deep-sided loaf tin (10 x 25 cm), oven
title: Mediterranean bread

ingredients.content: 50 g pitted black olives (approx. 15), cut into halves
50 g pitted green olives (approx. 15), cut into halves
50 g sun-dried tomatoes, cut into slices

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a deep-sided loaf tin (10 x 25 cm) and set aside.
Place rosemary leaves into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place basmati rice, brown rice, millet  and flaxseeds (linseeds) into mixing bowl and mill <b>1 min/speed 9<b>.
Add arrowroot flour, salt, guar gum and sugar and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place water and yeast into mixing bowl and heat <b>1 min/37°C/speed 1<b>.
Add oil, vinegar, eggs and reserved flour mixture and mix <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add olives, tomatoes and reserved rosemary and combine <b>10 sec//speed 2<b>, or until well combined.
Transfer batter into prepared tin and allow to prove in a warm place for 15 minutes.
Bake for 40-45 minutes (180°C). Allow to cool in tin for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely before serving.
